name: Mammoth Charge
summary: You Command an Animal to order your megafauna companion to Stride twice.
description:
You Command an Animal to order your megafauna companion to Stride twice. At any point during this movement, you can make a melee Strike against one enemy within reach.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.

Flourish: Flourish actions are actions that require too much exertion to perform a large number in a row. You can use only 1 action with the flourish trait per turn.
